c1.name: Purifying Wind
c1.descriptionRaw: <color=#FFD780FF>White Clouds at Dawn</color> gains 1 additional charge.
c1.description: White Clouds at Dawn gains 1 additional charge.

c2.name: Aloof From the World
c2.descriptionRaw:
After using a Skyladder from <color=#FFD780FF>White Clouds at Dawn</color>, Xianyun's ATK will be increased by 20% for 15s.
Additionally, the effects of the Ascension Talent "Consider, the Adeptus in Her Realm" will be enhanced: When the Starwicker created by <color=#FFD780FF>Stars Gather at Dusk</color> has Adeptal Assistance stacks, nearby active characters' Plunging Attack shockwave DMG will be increased by 400% of Xianyun's ATK. The maximum DMG increase that can be achieved this way is 18,000.
Each Plunging Attack shockwave DMG instance can only apply this increased DMG effect to a single opponent. Each character can trigger this effect once every 0.4s.
You must first unlock the Ascension Talent "Consider, the Adeptus in Her Realm."

c3.name: Creations of Star and Moon
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Stars Gather at Dusk</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Stars Gather at Dusk by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Mystery Millet Gourmet
c4.descriptionRaw: After using Skyladder 1/2/3 times during one <color=#FFD780FF>White Clouds at Dawn</color> Cloud Transmogrification state, when a Driftcloud Wave unleashed during that instance hits an opponent, it will heal all nearby party members for 50%/80%/150% of Xianyun's ATK. This effect can be triggered once every 5s.
c4.description: After using Skyladder 1/2/3 times during one White Clouds at Dawn Cloud Transmogrification state, when a Driftcloud Wave unleashed during that instance hits an opponent, it will heal all nearby party members for 50%/80%/150% of Xianyun's ATK. This effect can be triggered once every 5s.

c5.name: Astride Rose-Colored Clouds
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>White Clouds at Dawn</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of White Clouds at Dawn by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: They Call Her Cloud Retainer
c6.descriptionRaw:
After Xianyun uses 1/2/3 Skyladders within one Cloud Transmogrification caused by <color=#FFD780FF>White Clouds at Dawn</color>, the CRIT DMG of a Driftcloud Wave created in this instance of Cloud Transmogrification will be increased by 15%/35%/70%.
Within 16s after Xianyun has used <color=#FFD780FF>Stars Gather at Dusk</color>, White Clouds at Dawn will not enter CD. This effect will be canceled once she has used White Clouds at Dawn 8 times.
